onStart().Description: Called when the dialog is starting.

Parameters: boolean: Whether the dialog should be canceled when touched outside the window.
setCanceledOnTouchOutside(boolean).Description: Sets whether this dialog is canceled when touched outside the window's bounds. If setting to true, the dialog is set to be cancelable if not already set.

Parameters: Bundle: If this dialog is being reinitialized after a the hosting activity was previously shut down, holds the result from the most recent call to @B_android#app#Dialog#onSaveInstanceState_E@, or null if this is the first time.
onCreate(android.os.Bundle).Description: Similar to @B_android#app#Activity#onCreate_E@, you should initialize your dialog in this method, including calling @B_android#app#Dialog#setContentView_E@.

Parameters: int: Resource ID to be inflated.
setContentView(int).Description: Set the screen content from a layout resource. The resource will be inflated, adding all top-level views to the screen.

Parameters: View: The desired content to display.
setContentView(android.view.View).Description: Set the screen content to an explicit view. This view is placed directly into the screen's view hierarchy. It can itself be a complex view hierarchy.

setCancelable(boolean).Description: Sets whether this dialog is cancelable with the @B_android#view#KeyEvent#KEYCODE_BACK_E@ key.

ClassDesc: Base class for https:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#Dialog_E@s styled as a bottom sheet.
